column2: It seems [wl_consort_taker.GetBestName] has charmed [wl_consort.GetBestName] with the tales of [wl_consort_taker.GetHerHis] exploits as a member of [GetAinuWarriorSocietyName], seeing as [wl_consort.GetSheHe] has seen fit to become [wl_consort_taker.GetHerHis] consort.
I hope they make each other miserable!

Several members of [GetNivkhWarriorSocietyName] came to see me today, indicating that [FromFrom.GetBestName] has noticed my associating with several troublesome elements within [FromFrom.GetHerHis] realm. They suggested that it would be most unwise of me to continue such a course of action, seeing as accidents do happen...

Several members of [GetNivkhWarriorSocietyName] came to see me today, indicating that [FromFrom.GetBestName] has noticed my lack of support for [FromFrom.GetHerHis] righteous opposition to [Root.Liege.GetBestName]'s current rule. They suggested that it would be most unwise of me to not support [FromFrom.GetHerHim], seeing as accidents do happen...

I have been visited by several members of [GetBatakWarriorSocietyName] recently, who all seem keen to get to know someone related to the great [FromFrom.GetBestName]. Based on what they have told me, it seems I might have misjudged [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in the past, as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] seems to be a remarkable [FromFrom.GetManWoman].
I should get to know [FromFrom.GetHerHim] better!
